style_snapshot.art_direction: Bold neon green against deep black creates a striking cyberpunk aesthetic. Feels like walking into a high-tech gaming setup or entering a digital matrix world. The design has the energy of electric circuits and the sophistication of premium tech products.
style_snapshot.design_philosophy: Privacy-focused tech with bold visual impact
style_snapshot.visual_feel: Like stepping into a sleek gaming command center - all sharp edges, glowing interfaces, and that satisfying electric green that makes everything feel premium and powerful. The black space feels infinite and focused, while the green elements pulse with digital energy.

primary_palette.name: Electric Lime
primary_palette.usage: Primary brand color, CTA buttons, highlights, accent text
primary_palette.context: Main interaction color, appears on buttons and key text elements

primary_palette.name: Deep Black
primary_palette.usage: Primary background, header background, section backgrounds
primary_palette.context: Creates the dramatic dark mode foundation

primary_palette.name: Pure White
primary_palette.usage: Primary text, headings, body copy on dark backgrounds

primary_palette.name: Charcoal Grey
primary_palette.usage: Card backgrounds, subtle containers, secondary backgrounds

primary_palette.name: Dark Grey
primary_palette.context: Medium contrast elements that don't compete with white text

primary_palette.name: Medium Grey
primary_palette.usage: Inactive states, placeholder text, subtle UI elements
primary_palette.context: Lower hierarchy information and disabled states

primary_palette.name: Forest Green

primary_palette.name: Bright Lime
primary_palette.usage: Glow effects, active states, emphasis highlights

color_kit.usage_notes: The palette creates maximum contrast with electric green as the only color accent against monochromatic greys and blacks. This creates a focused, gaming-inspired aesthetic that feels both premium and energetic.

secondary_font.characteristics: Clean system font for optimal rendering

accent_text.effects: Electric green for emphasis and CTAs

composition_guidelines.layout_approach: Centered content blocks with generous white space

visual_hierarchy.primary: Large white headings with high contrast
visual_hierarchy.secondary: Green accent text for important actions
visual_hierarchy.tertiary: Regular white text for body content

instagram_1080x1080.text_scaling: Increase base sizes by 1.5x for mobile readability

primary_buttons.hover_state: Slight glow effect, darker green background

secondary_buttons.hover_state: Filled green background with black text

navigation.style: Clean horizontal nav with white text

consistency_patterns: Consistent use of electric green (#00FF00) for all interactive elements
Black backgrounds create dramatic contrast throughout
Sharp edges and minimal rounded corners maintain tech aesthetic
accessibility_considerations: High contrast ratios between text and backgrounds
Large touch targets for interactive elements
Clear visual hierarchy with size and color differentiation

component_classes.btn-primary: background: var(--primary-green); color: var(--dark-black); padding: 16px 32px; border-radius: var(--border-radius);
component_classes.btn-secondary: background: transparent; border: 2px solid var(--primary-green); color: var(--primary-green);
